summary:
This mod adds two new re-textured glass armors (non-replacer).
Fully craftable and upgradeable. Lore friendly and balanced.
descriptionHtml:
[h1]NEWS FLASH: I\'ll be on a skieing trip from February 15th till February 24th![/h1]

This mod adds a new retextured and improved glass armor.
Glass armor that actually has glass that you are able to look through.
And without the greenish style to it.

To get this armor go to the dragonslair next to Morthal on the mountain, 
there you\'ll find a chest with all you need. And for the more \"Lore friendly\" 
players out there, buy it at the local blacksmith!

[b]NOTE:[/b] This does not replace the vanilla armor or conflict with any glass armor altering mod.

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]Skype:[/b] Dyramisty
[b]Facebook:[/b] [url=http://www.facebook.com/ddeheer]Dylan de Heer[/url]

[b]Skyrim Nexus:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1384870]Dyramisty[/url]

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]CHANGELOG:[/b] 
V1.0:
Release

V2.0:
* Added a dark version of the armor (More valuable and stronger)
* Added effect to the arrows, looks nice at night
* Added all crafting recipes. Able to craft both armors and all weapons including arrows at all forges.

V2.2:
* Added enchantment for wearing full Shadow Glass Armor
* Fixed minor bugs

V3.0:
* Added all recipes
* Added all tempering data (Upgrade your own gear)
* Fixed minor bugs
author: Dyramisty
